title: Silent safari: lion
brief_description: Shows without commentary the lion as he eats, sleeps and plays with female and cubs in his natural habitat. Also shows lions living together in prides, and hunting wild beasts such as antelope, zebra, buffalo or giraffe. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
